docs.title: Hello, I'm Chandra Doredla
docs.text:
• Data Engineer
  • Platform Engineer
  • Software Developer
  • AI Enthusiast

docs.title: Professional Summary
docs.text: I'm a seasoned Data and Platform Engineer with 5 years of experience building scalable data pipelines, AI systems, and developer platforms. I specialize in bridging the gap between data science and production engineering, with expertise in both backend systems and modern AI technologies.

docs.title: Technical Expertise
docs.text:
• Python Expert-level development for data processing, APIs, and ML pipelines

  • PyTorch Building and optimizing deep learning models

  • LLM & AI Developing with large language models and generative AI

  • LangChain Creating sophisticated AI agents and workflows

  • Vector Databases Implementing semantic search and retrieval systems

  • TypeScript Building type-safe frontend applications

  • React Crafting responsive and interactive user interfaces

  • Next.js Building server-rendered React applications

docs.title: Let's Connect
docs.text:
I'm always interested in collaborating on innovative projects that push the boundaries of what's possible with data and AI. Feel free to explore my writing or reach out to discuss potential opportunities.

GitHub

LinkedIn

Email

docs.title: What is Docker?
docs.text:
Docker is a platform that uses OS-level virtualization to package and run applications inside software containers.
